Class ComposedShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • ComposedShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>, Shape

    public class ComposedShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    This class calculetes how shapes could draw in another shapes.
